title: High tariffs likely to reduce domestic efficiency

content.prompt: Which of the following would be most likely to occur if the United States placed high tariffs on imported goods?

choices.label: Workers in the United States would have more jobs in the long run.
Income in the United States would be redistributed from the rich to the poor.
The United States standard of living would increase.
The United States economy would become less efficient.

topic.text: 1.3: Comparative Advantage and Gains from Trade

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
